name: Maze (for Brackey's 2022.1 Game Jam)
description: This Is my submission for the game jam. It's the first game I've ever made and I dumped a lot of time into it. Had a lot of fun! I might develop it a little more after the jam is over. The game is very unpolished and far from what I wanted it to be. The game quite literally doesn't have an end because I didn't have the time nor energy to figure out how to do it. I have some other game ideas so there is no guarantee that I will update it.
